High Heart06977lk1bo9jbw12ozrlpgca5tb8whz0uvpc1200102014-03-28T13:59:39ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:High Heart Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of High Heart on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''High Heart''' is a hill in [[the Riverlands]], south-east of [[Riverrun]] and near [[Acorn Hall]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/twins/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, The Twins entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/harrenhall/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Harrenhal entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, High Heart was sacred to the [[Children of the Forest]]. Around its crown stands a ring of thirty-one [[weirwood]] stumps. The hill is considered a very safe place due to its relative height compared to the very flat surrounding land that it makes it nearly impossible to be approached unseen. The nearby smallfolk avoid the area as it is said to be haunted by the slaughtered Children who had been killed by the [[Andals|Andal]] King Erreg the Kinslayer.
